headline: PG&E Corp Witnesses Increased Demand from Data Center Growth
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is counted among the Best Nuclear Energy Stocks to Buy Right Now. The company has emerged as a top player in the current AI boom, witnessing a jump of more than 40% this year in requests for power supplies from data center developers across northern California.
